.. _api-resources-op:

===========================
API: Openpolitici Resources
===========================
Resources may be instance or list.


.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   
   locations
   politicians
   decisionmakers
   similarity

These API are already implemented and need documentation:

* professions
* education levels
* institutions
* charge types
* statistics
* cityreps
* historical_city_mayor
* historical_location_government
* current_city_mayor
* current_location_government
